My favorite horror survival game, its very fun but once you get expirienced it gets boring after awhile. I think the game needs to add a different gamemode like 2 killers and 8 survivors just to keep the existing members interested. But other than that a great game with occasional bugs and glitches but still fun. :)

Dead By Daylight is like tag but with a killer. 

For survivor 
That feeling as you run for your life & hiding out of sight so close to you that you can hear the killer breathing, and when it sees you, all you can do is run. To get as far away as possible as the killer catches up to you, hoping you can hear the sound of the gate powered and dashing for the gate as it just opens. Just by the skin of your teeth, you get out. 

For killer 
At first, you might feel a little hesitant to play killer but take it from me; you got to crawl before you walk, but when you get the hang of it.
It will be so much fun being bad. 

Yep just like tag, but even better

真的好玩好玩好玩好玩好玩啊！我恨我自己，为什么是这样一个沉迷杀鸡的弱智女孩。【如果嫌长，可以直接拖到最后一条了。
别人吃鸡我杀鸡，我只杀鸡不吃鸡，鸡杀完了送人次。
从一开始，我是个听乌鸦叫会害怕，听BGM会害怕，看地图名字“腐败屠宰场“”疯人院“都会害怕的小辣鸡。尽管现在还是。
听到心跳声，立刻蹿得老高，却跑也不敢跑，只敢找个树荫蹲蘑菇，祈祷我穿的一身黑屠夫眼瞎看不见..
结果屠夫并不瞎，一刀把我砍懵，反应过来之后，就开启满地图瞎叽霸跑模式OAO
不会放板，即使跑到了有板的地方，我也因为蹿太快了来不及放..再绕回去想放板砸晕的时候，我已经趴在地上了。
也有不离不弃，即使屠夫守尸也要来强救的队友，虽然很大概率最后也被砍趴..
现在已经略有进步，即使心跳声飞快，也能镇定自若该修修，该摸摸了。
不就是上树吗，德玛西亚人从不退缩！
虽然在屠夫刀下活不过两分钟，但如果有人遛，我也能苟一苟，悄悄咪咪修两台电机了，偶尔还能摸门让队友跑。
队友都死没了，我也能在苟护士的追杀下拖着老弱病残之躯一瘸一拐地找地道。
之前买过杀鸡，因为晕3D退款了，这次折扣又心痒痒，还是买来试了一下。除了玩屠夫外，其他都不怎么晕。
买了一套双马尾黑衣，黑妹粉衣，两个皮肤DLC，偶尔也会穿彩虹衣骚一把，开局秒上树看风景。
但..我们小仙女绝不认输，上树也要美美的上树呢。 【指甲油表情
一个人玩这游戏真的很怕，单排队友都是瓜皮，不会修机也不会遛，我们四个瓜皮到底要怎么玩啊 敲里吗？OAO
来和我一起玩游戏吧，我会在你翻车上树之后温柔对你说，垃圾，真鸡儿菜。
但，我转身就会去救你，即使我也被砍趴，但，大家一起挂在地下室不是更好吗！挣扎个800分也是好的呀..
所以，你还在这里看毛线呢？买杀鸡啊！！速度买买买啊！！！！来和我玩杀鸡啊！！！！！好玩死了啊！！！！！！啊！！！！！！！

Best team play game !!!

Dead by Daylight.. cara simplismente um jogo incrivel.

-No DBD as partidas são de 4 vs 1 são 4 sobreviventes e 1 assassino você pode escolher entre jogar como sobrevivente ou assassino, o papel dos sobreviventes é ligar geradores para poder escapar vivos, ja o papel do assasino é impedir que os sobreviventes escapem matando um por um.

-O DBD conta com diversos mapas divertidos de se jogar e diversos personagens, tem varios assassinos e sobreviventes para se escolher, caso prefira ainda tem as DLC'S que geralmente adicionam um novo sobrevivente e um novo assassino.

-Os graficos do game são bons, não são perfeitos como alguns jogos por ai mas eles são muito bons, ele não é um jogo que requer um otimo computador, se você tiver um computador razoável você ira conseguir roda-lo sem nenhum problema.

-O frio na barriga que o jogo tras é muito bom, o jogo é realmente muito tenso e emocionante, você vai se estressar bastante e se divertir bastante.

Recomendo demais esse jogo, ainda mas pra quem gosta de jogos de terror e tensão vai adorar esse jogo, é um otimo jogo para se jogar com os amigos, pode ter certeza que com os amigos rola muita diversão e zoeiras.

there is only one thing i can say, and that is :fuck the doctor, he is literally my hard counter im a big baby when it comes to scary games, dead by daylight was tolerable more adrenaline pumping and anxiety giver than scary, and then my first seconds into playing against the doctor made me hate him and loathe him with a passion, with the doctor as the killer i have to play with one hand covering my face, good game doe, i just hate the doctor for being good at what he does

自从第五人格事件后制作组要么被网易收编要么膨胀了，总之就是一点人事不干。第一点：不知道是为了让玩家少获得血点防止PY这种短视脑回路还是国产策划的旧套路激化玩家矛盾制造流量，反正修改段位机制直接导致人类屠夫对立，玩家们以前不在乎血点一场游戏人屠可以高高兴兴玩完甚至建立友谊，现在每一局游戏人屠都要勾心斗角消耗心力，打完了还要GGCNM，各种玩家交流渠道也是乌烟瘴气。第二点：无限氪金制，真是为了赚钱脸都不要了，新生化危机DLC套装皮肤和原皮肤一模一样强制消费，买断＋内购＋通行证，你怎么不再来一个季票把所有网游消费模式都装上？
Has gotten much better over the past few months, although there is still room for improvement.

Aprés pas mal d'heures de jeu je pense qu'il est temps de fournir mon avis sur ce jeu qu'est Dead By Daylight ( que j'abrégerais en dbd par la suite ).

Alors dbd c'est quoi ? C'est un jeu d'action multi-joueurs qui se joue par partie de 5 joueurs ( 4 survivants et 1 tueur ). Pour résumer les choses en simple le but des survivants et de parvenir à s'enfuir de la carte en parvenant à allumer 5 générateurs parmis ceux disséminés à travers la carte et le but du tueur est de parvenir à sacrifier les survivants avant que ces derniers ne parviennent à s'échapper. 

Des objectifs simples à réaliser me diriez vous ? lorsqu'on lance sa première partie en tant que survivant tous confiant dans la réussite de notre évasion avec nos coéquipiers, puis la réalité nous rattrape on se rencontre qu'on est une grosse merde pour réparer les générateurs, qu'on est la première cible du tueur, et qu'on est incapable de le fuir, et on meurt dans l'incompréhenssion et la rage en se demandant pourquoi on à acheter ce jeu, voilà comment devrait se résumer votre première partie en tant que survivant dans ce jeu ( enfin pour la plupart :) ) . Alors certes il peut arriver vite que l'on laisse tomber dbd aprés quelques games peu fructueuses . Alors faut-il laisser tomber pour autant ? Et bien non car dans le cas de dbd ce n'est pas forcément le gain de niveau ou le fait d'avoir un meilleur personnage qui vous permettra de remporter votre victoire en tant que survivant ( même si cela aide un peu X) ) mais cela se baseras sur la coopération et l'expérience ce sont ces deux choses qui vous permettrons de faire la différence dans vos partie en tant que survivant on apprend à réfléchir comme le tueur, à faire les meilleurs choix pour survivre. Et à partir de ce moment on prend plaisir à jouer, bon certe qu'en on joue entre potes c'est encore mieux !!! 

Et pour le tueur qu'en est-il ? Et bien la même chose l'expérience fait la différence . Pour autant jouer le tueur et tout aussi amusant que de jouer le survivant, en pourchassant inlassablement vos proies dans le but de les sacrifiés une par une pour l'Entité. De plus chaque tueur à sa manière jouer qui lui est propre et c'est ce qui fait la force de jeu !

Alors oui comme tout jeu il à aussi ces quelques défauts :
- La communauté c'est un peu le noir et le blanc qui s'oppose d'un coté on trouvera des joueurs avec qui il sera super fun de jouer qui seront d'excellent alliés, ou encore qui feront preuve d'un bon fair-play ( je parle surtout des tueurs ), puis de l'autre coté on peut trouver des alliés inutiles ( Padamalgam hein, je ne parle pas des nouveaux joueurs mais des joueurs qui ne sont là que pour sauver leurs peau ou qui font que de la merde alors qu'ils sont de haut rang ), des tueurs avec aucun fair-play ( je parle surtout des campeurs ).
- Certains tueurs ou certaines compétences qui déséquilibre complétement les parties ( Freddy juste Freddy ).

En bref ça reste un bon jeu que je recommande, très fun à jouer mais je conseille d'y jouer avec des potes pour que cela soit vraiment fun.
В такую помойку я ещё не играл

[h1] 6/10 [/h1]

Bem, Dead by Daylight (DBD) é um jogo simples que consiste apenas em 4 sobreviventes tentando sobreviver de um assassino, tendo que reparar 5 geradores para conseguirem abrir as portas, e irem embora. No entanto, o assassino (killer) tem o principal objetivo de derrubar os sobreviventes usando seus poderes únicos e especiais (cada killer tem um poder diferente), e colocar os sobreviventes em um gancho, para que uma certa entidade possa os matar.
[i] Fácil? Simples? EM TESE, sim. [/i]

[h1] Pontos fortes: [/h1]
1. Cara, é super divertido de jogar, aprendendo mais e mais coisas com o tempo, formas de dibrar os killers, evoluir.
2, Jogar com os amigos é melhor ainda
3. Da pra você descontar a sua raiva jogando de killer, esmagando os sobreviventes
4. Você pode comprar habilidades com os pontos que recebe jogando partidas (bloodpoints)
5. As partidas, em média, são rápidas

[h1] Pontos fracos: [/h1]
1. O jogo tem muitos bugs, sejam eles visuais, ou que atrapalham a movimentação, etc.
2. Eu acho o jogo super desbalanceado, e na maioria das vezes, sofro jogando de killer, pois, os sobreviventes precisam saber apenas os básicos dos mapas e terem sorte para as janelas e pallets spawnarem em bons lugares, que os killers estão [spoiler] fodidos [/spoiler], além dos itens dos sobreviventes serem SUPER APELÕES.
3. Os desenvolvedores demoram pra arrumar as coisas do jogo
4. A comunidade estraga o jogo com [i] facecamping [/i] (pesquise facecamping DBD, que você acha o que é), tunneling (focar 1 sobrevivente, etc)
5. Pessoas super tóxicas
6. Os desenvolvedores costumam lançar atualizações inúteis para o jogo, e, atualizações que podiam estar melhorando a expêriencia dos jogadores são encontradas apenas em longo prazo
7. [u] O KILLER É O HOST DA PARTIDA [/u], sim, a conexão da partida depende do killer, ou seja, se a internet do killer foi de 1MB, provavelmente todos os sobreviventes vão ficar super lagados, quase impossível de jogar.
8. [u] A CONEXÃO É UMA MERDA. [/u] O jogo funciona através de lobbies, ou seja, o killer cria um lobby, 4 jogadores entram, e se marcam como "prontos para jogar". O problema é que por mais que você seja brasileiro, não irão entrar apenas brasileiros e boludos no seu lobby, não, meu amigo, vão entrar [b] RUSSOS, ALEMÕES, JAPONESES, COREANOS, NORTE-AMERICANOS, ETC [/b], o que dificulta mais ainda ter uma jogatina decente.


[h1] [b] CONCLUSÃO [/b] [/h1]
O jogo é bom, por mais que muitas vezes você irá passar rages e muita raiva porque o seu time é [b] inútil, não tem noção, são trollers, etc. [/b]
É super viciante, e com o tempo, você vai aprendendo a [b] lidar [/b] com os bugs, conexão e sociedade.
Os desenvolvedores estão trabalhando em [b] [u] futuras [/u] [/b] atualizações para melhorar o jogo.
Cara, compre, se dedique ao jogo, ele perde a graça se você é ruim e não sabe o básico.
Você vai entender melhor tudo que eu disse na sua experiência.
Pesquise vídeos sobre o jogo para ter uma visão não tão teórica sobre o que eu disse.

this game is AMAZING....action-packed but still calm in a way. stealthy while having a sense of rushed panic. trying to find your way through a maze, knowing exacly where to go and what to do but not knowing how to do your job because: is the killer going to check the closet? how far away is that chainsaw? does the huntress need to refill on axes? is that a trap on the ground? can i make it past him without being seen? do i have enough time to get this chest? should i risk to take him off the hook? where was that generator? there are so many questions and situations that can either risk you getting caught or saving a teammate, being stuck in a closet or making that quick getaway, and the only thing helping you, is yourself.

I'm not sure whether to say it's great. I mean the community is garbage. Never listen to those post game. Matchmaking is weird. It is fun and all but friends are definitely better. I'm really mixed up about it. Eat eggs and drink vitamins.

While I love a good challenge I gotta say I find it pretty hard to play after a month of taking a break just to get curbstomped by a rank 20 killer with 2000 hours. How does that even happen? How does a dev team allow for a system where my teammates with less than 30 hours get paired up against an elite killer. 

Lets say that, I am being a baby and that this is totally fine (lol it isnt) and okay to pair up 2000 hr players with 30 hour players. So now I have to finish the match by myself with 5 gens left still to do and a player with more than double my playtime. Its impossible frankly. 

The devs are adding in graphical updates left and right, while the community is begging for fair play. And it wasnt always this way. I have 600 hours in the game. I dont have that in alot of games. I play casually with friends who play competitively. I want to like this game but I find it harder and harder, and not because of the game mechanics, but because of the dev team refusing to address anything besides endorsement deals and new cosmetics.

Moin Moin,

an die Überlebenden, seht es bitte aus BEIDEN SICHTEN. Danke.

Ich kann das Spiel zwar epfehlen aber es ist Momentan so, dass die Mörder immer als "Camper" bezeichnet werden sobald man 10 Meter um den Hacken rum läuft. Das ist echt schlimm und lächerlich. Man spielt das Böse was nicht für ihre Fairness bekannt ist und wird regelrecht geflamt und beleidigt nur am Hacken zu stehen und zu "Campen" was auch ein ziemlicher Nachteil ist, da man in der Zeit genügend Generatoren machen kann! Außerdem was soll man machen wenn bereits 2 Leute drum herum laufen um den Überlebenden runter zu holen und danach sofort zu heilen ? Soll ich weg gehen und somit wieder am Anfang stehen nur, dass sie bereits 1-3 Generatoren gemacht haben? Lächerlich Leute... wirklich Lächerlich. Der Killer soll wie in den Filmen einfach stark und Angsteinflösend da gestellt werden und es ist nur natürlich das er den längeren Hebelt hat. Team Play muss funktionieren dann gewinnen die Überlebenden, sonst nicht. Der Killer muss Stärker, Schneller, Tödlich und unfair sein... Meine Güte, sonst sieht man sich doch keinen Horrorfilm an oder ?
Die Überlebenden sind zu op meiner Meinung nach:
- Überlebende können sich gegenseitig heilen ohne Medikit
- Sind 4-1 in der Überzahl (3-1 wäre ausglichener)
- Haben starke, Konter Perks
- Sobald man den Bogen raus hat, sind Überlebende dem Killer weit vorraus. (Taschenlampe zum Beispiel)
- Selbst wenn man sie Nieder schlägt, sieht man den krabbelnden nicht (wird nicht Makiert)
- Zum Größtem Teil sind die Maps für die Überlebenden ausgelegt und zum Nachteil des Killers (Sichtfeld, Geräusche wie die Tankstelle wo nur der Killer die Glocke auslöst)
- Killer können nur mit einer Opfergabe sofort Töten (Geht dann nur eine Runde und ist SUPER SELTEN zu bekommen)
- Das Töten eines Überlebenden dauert am Haken viiiiiiiiel zu lange (ca. 3 Minuten = Zwei Generatoren)
- Die Überlebenden können, wenn stark dezimiert, instant eine Falltür zur Flucht nutzen
- Nur überlebende können Items auf der Map nutzen und sogar behalten
- Paletten muss der Killer vernichten um durch zu kommen und wird sogar betäubt wenn er dabei getroffen wird
und es gibt noch ein Paar weitere Nachteile vom Killer. Klar er ist schneller, hat ein Paar Fähigkeiten aber... hey, das wird alles aus gekontert. Ohne in der Nähe vom Hacken zu bleiben bekommt man so gut wie keine Überlebenden klein, dass weis Jeder Killer... also auch an die Überlebenden, seht es bitte aus BEIDEN SICHTEN. Danke.

After hundreds of hours played I must admit that this game is fantastic, not only because of the large number of iconic horror movie characters, but each game is different from the previous one and creates a great addiction. The game is constantly evolving, every time things are added or modified in the game.

This is definitely my favorite game and I look forward to every DLC that comes out.

----------------------------------------------

Despues de cientos de horas jugadas debo admitir que este juego es fantastico, no solo por la gran cantidad de personajes iconicos de peliculas de terror, sino que cada partida es distinta a la anterior y crea una gran adicción. El juego esta en constante evolución, cada vez se agregan o modifican cosas en el juego.

Este es en definitiva mi juego favorito y espero con ansias cada DLC que sale.

Most of the games are so laggy, I stand in one place for 3 seconds and my charater teleports 2-3 meters away, like wtf? I didn't even move, or the hitbox is another gem in this game I fast vault a window I hear the killer miss the hit by hitting the window I make 2 steps and I get injuered like wtf?? Awesome game, I bought every DLC (Besides Soundtrack).

If you're a survivor with a couple friends it's the most fun imo, teamwork makes the dream work.
It has some of the most iconic killers from the movies i.e. Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger, Leatherface --
along with some Dead By Daylight exclusives. It also has a large Survivor pool with Laurie Strode from Halloween,
and Quentin Smith from A Nightmare on Elm Street with many more Dead By Daylight Exclusives.

[b]Gameplay Review:[/b]
The Gameplay is great, there is a Killer and 4 survivors. You all spawn at the same time. As a Killer --
your objective is to sacrifice all the survivors to The Entity before they escape. As a Survivor --
Your job is to use teamwork to repair the Generators and escape through the Exit Gates.
If your teamate gets caught and put on the Sacrificial Hook you can attempt to rescue him/her.
If you're the last alive you can escape through The Hatch that opens on the ground.

[b]Points System Review:[/b]
The points system keeps you coming back for more with Perks, Tools and Add-ons. Also the --
Daily Rituals give you a nice bonus to your collection of BloodPoints (BP). The Shrine of Secrets
gives you the opportunity to grab perks you'd otherwise never get from characters you don't play.
You can teach unique perks from any character to the character you like.

[b]Final Thoughts:[/b]
Personally, I love this game. I've never played a game quite like it. Its simple but hard to master mechanics make for a very fun experience & the iconic killers make you feel like you're in the movie. I HIGHLY reccomend this game.
Apesar dos bugs recomendo fortemente este jogo!!

Incredible game if you don't mind the bugs.  The bugs are the real killer though.  I was matched up and the game was on the loading screen just to be kicked out one too many times this time.  You might be in a group of 4 friends and one person might not load up forcing them to wait for the others to finish their game.  Also for some reason, you can't keep your same group.  After every match, you go back into single player mode and pressing "Join a Lobby"will have you join another group of 3 people.  You have to exit the screen, select "Survive with Friends", and reinvite your friends after every match.  

This game is just way too buggy.  You'll have moments of fun and moments of utter dissapointment becasue of a bug.  I never complain about bugs if it's an early release game but game has been out for well over a year.  Devs should have kept this in Early Access until they've got rid of the major bugs that plague this game.  Very frusterating.

While Dead By Daylight continues to receive the criticism and praise from closely watching Redditors, I have felt that the steady stream of updates and new content has provided a stable community and a consistent gaming forum for both casuals and enthusiasts.  New killers continue to receive perks and the new bloodweb recently released goes to show that the dev team is listening to the community in many aspects.  The new 'Battle Pass' variation has got me spending more hours playing this game than I should.

Ich würde mal sagen dieses Spiel ist-ähnlich wie Mario Kart-eine Achterbahn der Gefühle. Hier kommen Wut, Hass, Freude, Befriedigung und noch mehr Emotionen zusammen. Es ist ein Spiel wo man sich hocharbeiten muss, man kann nicht alles von Beginn an. Egal ob Survivor oder Killer, es gibt immer Höhe- und Tiefpunkte...wünsche allen die sich das Spiel holen viel Spaß damit, egal ob mit Freunden oder alleine. Wer weiß, vielleicht trifft man sich ja ingame mal...

Aye yo ma, why you gotta keep playing games with me like this is Dead by Daylight. I first met you when I was No Mithered. You Autodidact my heart and Dead Harded into my life. You were like my Deliverance. I showed you my appreciation by giving you the Skeleton Key to my heart, Rainbow Map to my soul, and Septic Agent when I was feeling down. You Borrowed Time just when the killer named "Life" showed up to put me on a hook. Time and time again, you saved me from the basement and would let me pull god pallet to make sure I was safe. Whenever I injured, you would pop the last generator, activating my Adrenaline. Whenever I was downed, you would always be there, ready to flashlight the killer, saving me from his grasp. Whenever you take aggro from the killer you would give me just enough time to be Unbreakable. For that, I'll always sacrifice myself so you can take hatch. Thank you.
